text: Les Auxons is a commune. It is in Bourgogne-Franche-Comté in the Doubs department in east France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2015 and consists of the former communes of Auxon-Dessus (the seat) and Auxon-Dessous. Arrêté de la Préfecture du Doubs n°2014272-0014 du 29 septembre 2014 portant création de la commune nouvelle des Auxons au 1er janvier 2015. == References == Category:2015 establishments in France Category:Communes in Doubs
title: Les Auxons
